display_long_description:
# The Pro Video Player for Universal Connectivity

This isn't just another streaming app — it's a portal that makes your PC feel truly native to VR. 
   * ⚡ 1-Frame Latency.
   * 🎯 Zero Mouse Lag.

Do you like this screen-to-screen latency? 😉

[media]

**🚀 The Most Powerful NDI Player**

Twinkle's full-featured NDI capabilities unlock new possibilities for streaming on Meta Quest platform.
[media]

**🎧 Spatial Audio: Local files & NDI Streams**
   * Ambisonics: FOA, SOA, HOA, Audio360.
   * Automatic Stereo Spatialization.
[media]


 **✨ First VR Player supports 3D LUTs**
   * Load .cube files for instant film-grade stylization.
   * Rapidly transform your videos with professional color looks.

 
**🌟First VR Player supports STMap**
* Real-time fisheye unwrapping, no high-end PC required.
* Direct camera footage processing for true WYSIWYG.

# Support & Community Hub

Find all resources and connect with us at:

https://www.twinkle-vr.com

- PC Streaming Setup Guides.
- Troubleshooting & FAQs.
- Submit Feature Requests.
- Join Our Community.
